CustomField.description: This is used to drive which quote template to use.
CustomField.formula: IF(ISPICKVAL(Stationary__c, "EMS"), "PP_Print_Quote_EMS", IF(ISPICKVAL(Stationary__c, "Customer Service"), "PP_Print_Quote_CS", IF(ISPICKVAL(Stationary__c, "Cardiac"), "PP_Print_Quote_Cardiac", IF(ISPICKVAL(Stationary__c, "Australia"), "PP_Print_Quote_AU", IF(ISPICKVAL(Stationary__c, "New Zealand"), "PP_Print_Quote_NZ", IF(ISPICKVAL(Stationary__c, "EMEA"), "PP_Print_Quote_EMEA", "PP_Print_Quote" ))))))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This is used to drive which quote template to use.
CustomField.label: Quote Template
